2015-12-28|2016-01-03.description: It’s the team-up you never expected, as Superman and Parasite take on those other energy suckers, the Pale Riders, to free Firestorm! Meanwhile, Wonder Woman fights an unstoppable behemoth that can contain—and consume—her powers!
2015-12-28|2016-01-03.name: Power Hungry

2015-12-28|2016-01-03.description: In a Soviet Gulag, Supergirl and Stargirl's father is compelled by a mysterious woman to help her bring his daughters back home.
2015-12-28|2016-01-03.name: Allies Part 6 of 9

2015-01-12|2015-01-18.description:
Chapter Titles

  • Night 229: The World's Strongest Magician
  • Night 230: David and Solomon
  • Night 231: To the World in Another Dimension
  • Night 232: Solomon's World
  • Night 233: The Rebellion Against The Light
  • Night 234: The Revolt of the Eight-Pointed Star
  • Night 235: The Return of Solomon
  • Night 236: Solomon's Avatar
  • Night 237: How The New World Came To Be
  • Night 238: Aladdin's Suggestion
2015-01-12|2015-01-18.name: Volume 24

2015-01-26|2015-02-01.description: DWMA braces for the final showdown as the Kishin awakens from his slumber at heart of the moon. Unable to contain his rage, Noah is the first to attack, the Book of Eibon and “BREW” fueling his assault. But despite his formidable efforts, Noah is overcome not by the Kishin, but by the sudden appearance of Crona. With the world hanging in the balance, DWMA can only wonder who will prove to be the greater foe–the Kishin…or Crona…
2015-01-26|2015-02-01.name: Vol. 24

2015-02-02|2015-02-08.description: FINAL ISSUE!!! Driven by the need to avenge his father’s murder and clear the name he himself is not permitted to bear, Jon Snow breaks his solemn vow and deserts from the Night’s Watch—an action for which there is but a single penalty: death. Meanwhile, Eddard’s heir, Robb Stark, seeks to rally his bannermen, not all of whom are eager to follow the young, unproven leader, no matter whose son he may be. And Daenerys, grief-stricken at the death of her husband, Drogo, builds a great funeral pyre to consume the hollow remnants of her life... only to find herself present at the fiery birth of a new age.

volume.name: George R.R. Martin's A Game of Thrones

2015-02-09|2015-02-15.description:
The 2nd chapter of the BLACK VORTEX!

With the Slaughter Squad hot on their tails, the X-Men and the Guardians of the Galaxy are going to have to find somewhere to stash this loot.

The odds against them, their only option for gaining the upper hand might lie with the mysterious Black Vortex.

Will the temptation of the Black Vortex’s unknown power be too much for this band of misfits?

Note: Warlock, Angela, Howard the Duck, Mantis, Brood, Cosmo, the Watcher and the Impossible Man only appear on the cover.

List of covers and their creators:

VarCosmically Enhanced Variant CoverAndrea Sorrentino3
VarVariant CoverPhil Noto4
2ndSecond Printing CoverValerio Schiti & Jason Keith2
2015-02-09|2015-02-15.name: The Black Vortex Chapter 2

2015-02-09|2015-02-15.description:
Trapped deep underground in the sinkhole that mysteriously appeared in the middle of the Black Rock Desert, STORM battles her claustrophobia while trying to find answers.

Meanwhile, her teammates above ground discover that the phenomenon has ties to old enemies…
2015-02-09|2015-02-15.name: The Burning World Part 2

2015-02-09|2015-02-15.description: Things are out of control in this latest installment of the Sonic Archives series! It's a time of upheaval for Sonic and his friends! The lives of the royal family hang in the balance, so King Acorn leads a brazen assault on Robotropolis-but to disastrous ends! Sonic races to save Uncle Chuck! Mysterious objects fall from space! Rotor finally returns home! It's just one thing after another! Sonic Archives 24 collects Sonic the Hedgehog #88-91. Featuring new cover art from Sonic comics legend Patrick "SPAZ" Spaziante!
2015-02-09|2015-02-15.name: Volume 24

2015-02-09|2015-02-15.description: Another colossal collection of outre’ and outrageous horror stories from the comics of the 1950’s is here- Crypt of Horror Volume 24: “The DEAD, The Demented and The Depraved ” edition !! 22 full stories originally printed in comics produced by long-defunct publishers including Fawcett, Ace ( four stories from their “The Beyond” issue #4 in fact) St. John, Superior, Standard/Nedor, Charlton and others, featuring art by Alex Toth, Bob Powell, Mike Sekowsky, Steve Ditko, Sheldon Moldoff, Bernard Bailey, Bob McCarty, Pierce Rice, Jim McLaughlin, Ken Rice, Charles Nicholas, Bob Forgione, Louis Zansky, Tony DiPreta, Mike Peppe, Rocke Mastroserio, Ben Brown, Dave Gantz and others. Tales reprinted from great Pre-Code horror titles like This Magazine Is Haunted, Journey Into Fear, Weird Horrors, The Unseen, Out Of The Shadows and more include: “The Monster’s Revenge”, “Pale Light of Death”, “Forbidden Forest”, “House In The Web”, “Images of Sand”, “I Lived Four Times”, “Last Stop”, “Dance of the Dead”, “Cult of the Undead”, “The Man With The Atomic Brain”, “Death Reaches Out”, “Stand-In For Death”, “Manhunt”, “What Lurks Below”, “It Happened On Valentine’s Eve”. “Death By Invitation”, “Dancing Lights of Kula”, “Trial By Ghostlight”, “Ed’s Young Wife”, “Shadow And Substance”, “The Little People”, and “Chant of the Hypnotic Chord”. All complete, unexpurgated and unseen since their initial publication almost 60 years ago, reproduced in crisp black and white using state-of-the-art technology.True horror fans best not pass up THIS one!
2015-02-09|2015-02-15.name: Volume 24

2015-02-09|2015-02-15.description: The streets don't come much meaner than those found in Mega-City One. Only the Judges keep the city from falling into total anarchy. Toughest of them all is Judge Dredd; he is the law and these are his stories. In this 24th volume of the bestselling Case Files series, Dredd is faced with one of his hardest challenges yet - dispensing justice in the "Big Meg's" worst sector known as "The Pit"! Also, the ultimate lawman faces a legendary war robot, when Judge Dredd squares off against the ABC Warrior Hammerstein!
2015-02-09|2015-02-15.name: Volume 24

volume.name: Judge Dredd The Complete Case Files

2015-02-09|2015-02-15.description: Diana’s adventure in Man’s World takes an unexpected turn as her battle skills help her defeat her most worrisome opponents yet: teenaged dirtbag Elbow and Dance Dance Retribution!
2015-02-09|2015-02-15.name: Wonder World Part 2 of 2

2015-02-23|2015-03-01.description:
ALL NEW HEAVENS

Two friends tell stories by the endless roaring sea.
2015-02-23|2015-03-01.name: All New Heavens

2015-03-09|2015-03-15.description: The final chapter of Year Three. Differences are temporarily put aside to stop the threat created by Mxyzptlk and Trigon. And the final fate of John Constantine is revealed.
2015-03-09|2015-03-15.name: Chapter Twenty-Four: Endgame

volume.name: Injustice: Gods Among Us Year Three

2015-04-06|2015-04-12.description: With help from Leigh, Ruidoso, and his strange new ally, X is ready to take on the predatory drug lord Gundog . . . but another call of duty beckons, this time from outside Arcadia. Is the man who gave his entire life for his city willing to leave it behind?

2015-04-20|2015-04-26.description: The penultimate issue! With the truth about F.A.U.L.T.Line revealed, Requiem, Terza, and Aisa must team up to protect Earth...but which Earth? And will the newly awakened heroes follow Requiem?
2015-04-20|2015-04-26.name: The Breaking of So Great A Thing Part 3 of 3

2015-05-04|2015-05-10.description:
The Great Burn is unveiled in the latest shocking chapter of Kieron Gillen's groundbreaking alternate history epic! The unbelievable aftermath of the Battleship fight between Germany's Sieglinde and Russia's Maria changes the very face of the war on all sides. As the world faces devastation on a global scale, the Allies encounter new horrors in the enhanced human war to end all wars.

Available with Regular, Wraparound, and Blitzkrieg Covers by Daniel Gete, a War Crimes Cover by Caanan White, and a Propaganda Poster Cover by Michael DiPascale.

2015-05-04|2015-05-10.deck: Quando i compagni d'armi sono in pericolo, Dragonero è pronto a intervenire!
2015-05-04|2015-05-10.description: "Diverso il passo, uguale il cuore". Così canta l'inno degli scout imperiali, perché è l'amicizia la vera forza che li tiene uniti... e quando tre scout hanno bisogno di aiuto, Ian, Gmor e Sera rispondono senza esitazione! Bryana, catturata da un Negromante, invia la sua lupa a chiamare Dragonero affinché vada in suo soccorso. Yannah, la scout del regno barbarico a Nord dell'impero, ha invece bisogno della forza di Gmor per ritrovare un'arma leggendaria rubata alla sua tribù. Sera, infine, viene portata dall'elfo Ewyan di fronte al peggiore incubo per un'elfa silvana... un nido di stritolatrici... ma il vero pericolo è oltre di esse, all'interno di un cimitero elfico caduto sotto il controllo di un demone.
2015-05-04|2015-05-10.name: Attraverso l'Erondár

2015-05-18|2015-05-24.description: Even though Bigby has a bullet wound to contend with, the mystery must be solved and the Sheriff has an interesting new lead to follow...

The penultimate chapter of Season 10! Mulder has come face to face with the mysterious leader of the resurrected Syndicate and learned many of its secrets. But will he survive the experience?

2015-06-15|2015-06-21.description: It’s hard to be a talking ape in the big bad city. Especially when you set out to be a drummer and became a super hero instead. But will that be enough? Can fame and adventure replace lifelong dreams? Do we even have to ask? Featuring Reflex 6, Samaritan and a few surprises.

2015-06-22|2015-06-28.description:
The final issue!

Facing the greatest threat in the world—the unstoppable madman known as the Archon—Captain Midnight and his allies need an ace in the hole to help pull out a victory! Thankfully, Cap has a plan . . . but will it be enough to stop the Archon when everything else has failed?

The epic conclusion to the X/Captain Midnight crossover event “Marked for Death”!

“Favorite Haunt,” Part 2! The sewers seem to be haunted by all manners of ghoulish ghosts and creatures... some are real, and some are not! Will Mike be able to convince his brothers of the truth?

2015-06-22|2015-06-28.description: The guest team of writer Ray Fawkes (BATMAN ETERNAL, CONSTANTINE) and artist Jon Bogdanove (SUPERMAN: THE MAN OF STEEL) bring back Marsha, Queen of Diamonds, for another bejeweled bout with the Dynamic Duo. When she strikes at a gala ball for Gotham City’s elite, will even guests Bruce Wayne and Dick Grayson fall under her spell?

2015-07-06|2015-07-12.description:
New arc begins here!

Haunted by memories of Hellboy, Abe crosses paths with a horrible monster in a sunken town, which reveals secrets of his own prehuman origins.

Features a flashback to the BPRD before Seed of Destruction!
2015-07-06|2015-07-12.name: The Shadow Over Suwanee, Part 1

2015-07-13|2015-07-19.description: The Little Prince and Fox fly back and forth across space to save planets before the Snake can destroy them. But this time, it's the Little Prince's Asteroid B612 that has been menaced: the Rose was kidnapped by his enemy! The Little Prince sets out for the Planet of the Snake, guided by the friends he made during his travels. But in the Snake's murky realm, the Little Prince will only be able to count on his courage and Fox's friendship. Will the Prince succeed in saving his Rose and vanquishing the Snake once and for all?
2015-07-13|2015-07-19.name: The Planet of the Snake

2015-07-20|2015-07-26.description: All roads have led to this! Don't miss the stunning finale of ARROW: SEASON 2.5!
2015-07-20|2015-07-26.name: Green Part 8: Prologue

2015-07-27|2015-08-02.description: "Monsters & Meltdowns" Part 2 of 2. Caitlin's adventure takes a strange turn when her former mentor ends up being even more insane than she remembers! Don't miss the electrifying finale of The Flash: Season Zero!
2015-07-27|2015-08-02.name: Mentors and Meltdowns Part 2 of 2

2015-07-27|2015-08-02.description: First issue in a special two-part story featuring the art of Philip Bond! The stress from their past adventures have the Doctor and Rory at each other's throats, and Amy has had just about enough. So she sends them on a boys night out, much to their chagrin, but with a TARDIS at their disposal.
2015-07-27|2015-08-02.name: The Doctor and The Nurse Part 1

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Eleventh Doctor Archives

2015-07-27|2015-08-02.description: It's the team-up you've been waiting for—Batman and…Deadshot?! Also, what is Project M? And what does it have to do with Simon Stagg? All this and more right here!
2015-07-27|2015-08-02.name: Suicide Blues Part 1 of 3

2015-08-10|2015-08-16.description:
The Tragic Tale of StrangeBlob NoPants

What with making his monthly sales quotas and homeschooling his kids, Pewfell's life is no longer his own. Could popular children's entertainer Strangeblob NoPants be the answer to all his problems?
2015-08-10|2015-08-16.name: The Tragic Tale of StrangeBlob NoPants

2015-08-24|2015-08-30.description:
As the fair opens at Alexandria, old friends return from afar and new adversaries make their introductions.

Collects THE WALKING DEAD #139-144.
2015-08-24|2015-08-30.name: Life and Death

2015-08-24|2015-08-30.description: Penultimate issue! The Sons’ big gun deal stalls when the SAMCRO gets caught up in a conflict with the ONH, a renegade Irish faction.

Lemmy and Omega Company look for traces of Amelia's magic in the Blended World while Hector gets a huge surprise in the Non-Magic one-- and not all surprises are fun, cake, and presents. Also - someone gets a new look. It's the final chapter of AMELIA COLE AND THE IMPOSSIBLE FATE, Lemmyheads!
2015-08-24|2015-08-30.name: Part 6

volume.name: Amelia Cole and the Impossible Fate

2015-09-21|2015-09-27.description:
Chapter 10 of Avaiyo, Vol. 02

After centuries of slavery under the oppressive rule of the Tamiran Empire, the people of Xiltria were finally able to regain their freedom. It's been nearly eight years since the Era of Slavery, and the tides of peace are beginning to wash away. Subtle remnants of the exiled Tamiran Empire still live on and are starting to give way towards a new threat.

One such threat has been brought to the doorstep of Pegil Village. Helpless to defend themselves, they call out for help in hopes that someone will answer. With their pleas heard, Sekken and Iyo push forward into the depths of Daskin's Lair. Separated from each other, they must rely on their own skills to face the impending dangers.
2015-09-21|2015-09-27.name: Ring of Innocence

2015-09-28|2015-10-04.description: For Simon Cooke, some things can get a little sticky…
2015-09-28|2015-10-04.name: Chapter Twenty-Four: Daisy Chained

2015-10-05|2015-10-11.description: It's "Opposite Day" at Titans Tower and chaos reigns supreme! But you know what they say about Opposite Day: it's all fun and games until someone accidentally tears open a rift into the Anti-Matter Universe.
2015-10-05|2015-10-11.name: Opposite Day!

2015-10-05|2015-10-11.description: It’s the conclusion to our Arkham Unhinged story this issue, as the Dark Knight closes in on the Bookbinder! But for the new Batman in Detective Comics, he faces his most devious foes yet – La Morte! Meanwhile, in Gotham Central, Montoya’s troubles are just beginning…

2015-10-12|2015-10-18.description: The shattering conclusion to the Year of the Gods! In this final chapter of Year Four, the balance of power may be tipped by the arrival of a force that could challenge even the Gods of Olympus.
2015-10-12|2015-10-18.name: Chapter Twenty-Four: Between the Gods

volume.name: Injustice: Gods Among Us Year Four

Sara finds herself out on a pier, literally and figuratively, and is swallowed up by exploding fairies and the relentless Yellow Slug, as the self-esteem tape—which plays in his head—does nothing to slow his destructive path of mayhem!

List of covers and their creators:

2015-10-19|2015-10-25.description: The Scooby gang has to join Harley and Ivy to get to the bottom of the mystery of the cursed relic-and, with a little help from Batgirl, they just might turn the tables to capture the villainesses too!
2015-10-19|2015-10-25.name: Gotham Ghouls Part 2

2015-11-02|2015-11-08.description:
Even the most devoted Peanuts fan will be surprised by revisiting Schulz’s last decade of work. Schulz’s cartooning has never been more expressive, and his sense of humor never more unencumbered by formula or tradition. In this volume, Charlie Brown gets caught up in a counterfeit autograph racket, Rerun gets accused of sexual harassment, the infamous “Crybaby” Boobie returns, Snoopy’s brothers go west on a quest to get jobs from Mickey Mouse, Snoopy gets his driver’s license, Rerun continues to pursue the underground arts, Linus starts his own church of Great Pumpkin believers and is declared a false prophet, and other surprises. This is the 24th volume (of 25) of the bestselling series collecting every single one of the 18,000-plus strips created by Schulz from 1950-2000.

Note: The digital edition (11/2/2015) for this volume was released before the print edition.

2015-11-09|2015-11-15.description:
Unity vs. the Armor Hunters…rematch!

GIN-GR, the reformed killer robot who destroyed Mexico City and rampaged through downtown Los Angeles during the Armor Hunters’ attack, has turned on her Unity teammates! As she perpetrates the world’s most unstoppable jailbreak – a head-first, guns-blazing, kamikaze flight straight into the military base that holds her one-time squad – can X-O Manowar, Livewire, Ninjak, and the Eternal Warrior stop the giant engine of destruction…while trapped inside it? And if they survive GIN-GR, all they have to look forward to is the remaining Armor Hunters attacking from all sides!

Multiple Harvey Award nominee James Asmus (QUANTUM AND WOODY) and rising superstar artist Diego Bernard (X-O MANOWAR) rocket UNITY into their most action-packed battle yet!

2015-11-16|2015-11-22.description: Spider-Man and the rest of the Midtown High Superheroes seem evenly matched with their Brighton clones. They'll need a plan to outmaneuver them, lest Musty never be rescued!

2015-11-23|2015-11-29.description:
“The Absolute Record: Part 6”—The fugitive Dr. Catherine Halsey makes her final, defiant stand against Spartan Commander Palmer in the explosive conclusion of this epic six-part chapter of the Halo® saga by Duffy Boudreau (BlackAcre) and Douglas Franchin (Person of Interest).

The climactic final issue of the Escalation story line!

The Halo® franchise has sales eclipsing $4.5 billion over its lifetime!

An essential addition to the Halo® canon!
2015-11-23|2015-11-29.name: The Absolute Record: Part 6

Chapter 15

Jeff is worried that his friend Connor knows he's a werewolf.

2015-11-30|2015-12-06.description:
76 pages of Astounding Action-Packed Arachnid-Adventure! Only £3.50!

Spiral begins! A new spider-saga from comic legend Gerry Conway! Spider-Man fights side-by-side with Wraith!

Plus, Spider-Man 2099 and Doctor Strange at the mercy of the malevolent Maestro!

Also, fresh from the pages of Spider-Verse, Spider-Gwen returns to battle the vile Vulture!

By Gerry Conway, Carlo Barberi, Peter David, Will Sliney, Jason Latour and Robbi Rodriguez!

Includes material reprinted from Amazing Spider-Man #16.1, Spider-Man 2099 #10 and Spider-Gwen #!
